description: List of participants on the plan of care tracked over versions as the plan is updated.

columns.name: POC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan of care record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PART_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type category ID for a plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Patient


Relation


Community Member

columns.name: PART_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider added as a plan of care participant.

columns.name: PART_COMM_MEM
columns.description: This item contains the free text name of a community member participating in the creation of the plan of care.

columns.name: PART_COMM_MEM_CNCT
columns.description: This item contains user entered contact information about a community member participant.

columns.name: PART_COMM_MEM_REL
columns.description: This item contains the relationship to the patient of a free text community member added to the plan of care.

columns.name: PART_DISCIPLINE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the discipline for the plan of care participant.

columns.name: PART_DISCIPLINE_ID_DISC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the discipline record.

columns.name: PART_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The role category ID for a plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Contributor


Reviewer


Owner

columns.name: PART_CMT
columns.description: This item contains comments about the participants. Comments up to 100 characters are allowed.

columns.name: PART_SIGNER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the participant in required to sign the plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PART_SIGNED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the participant has signed the plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Signed


Signed


Declined

columns.name: PART_SIG_DATE
columns.description: The date when the participant signed the plan of care.

columns.name: PART_SIG_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The signing method category ID for a plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Mark as Signed


Re-Authentication


E-Signature

columns.name: PART_MK_SIG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The mark as signed reason category ID for the plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Participant Signed on Paper


Other (See Comment)

columns.name: PART_MK_SIG_CMT
columns.description: This item contains a comment for the reason a participant was marked as signed.

columns.name: PART_CONTACT_RLA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient contact added as a participant for a plan of care.

columns.name: PART_DECLN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The decline reason category ID for a plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Refused to Sign


Unable to Sign


Other (See Comment)

columns.name: PART_DECLN_RSN_CMT
columns.description: This item contains the comment for the reason a participant declined to sign the plan.

columns.name: PART_EXTEND_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The extended role category ID for the plan of care participant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PART_AGRMNT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The agreement participant type category ID for participants on an agreement.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Subject


Signer

columns.name: PART_CONT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the contribution status for the corresponding participant on a plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Has Not Contributed


Has Contributed

columns.name: PART_CONTRIBN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant the contribution for the corresponding participant was recorded on the plan of care.

columns.name: PART_COMM_MEM_PAT_FACING_NAME
columns.description: This item contains the free text patient-facing name of a community member participating in the creation of the plan of care.

columns.name: PART_SIG_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The linked E-Signature document for a given participant.
